channel.title: WWE Discussion
channel.description:
I'm bored right now so I thought I'd make a topic about WWE (World Wrestling Entertainment). Who here watches it, who used to watch it, what are your favorite superstars, what do you like about it, what do you hate about it, what do you miss from it, favorite matches of all-time, etc. Perosnally, I'm pretty excited about what's going to happen tonight at Survivor Series with Randy Orton vs Wade Barret with John Cena being the ref. Usually to me the show is very predictable, but I'm not sure this time what's going to happen.
I'm fully aware it isn't "real" fighting, so those posts aren't necessary. Why do I watch it then? I don't really know, I guess I just like the storylines in it. It entertains me, hence the "E" in WWE. Movies aren't real but we still watch those. So inb4 "Fake and gay" faggots.
Discuss.

i use to watch it more when i was younger but i slowly stopped. even though it is fake, the damage is real and i bet none of you could do what they do.
[/quote]Meh its not that bad, getting hurt is fun.

Which explains why you punch glass :D[/quote]Indeed it is. ^^

item.description:

jmood128:

NO!! John Cena might be fired!! :mad:

I honestly don’t think they would though because he’s too much of a business risk if they did. He brings so many ratings in whether you hate him or not. Plus he’s the face of Monday Night Raw. It wouldn’t happen.

All agreed. My favorite Wrestlemania would be Wrestlemania x16 or 17, or especially the match when Big Show, Raven, and Masked Kane fought each other in a tripple threat hardcore match and Kane threw Raven through and entire window backstage and Big Show got thrown through a wall. Lol.

item.title: WWE Discussion
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“QuestMaster 2K10, post:9, topic:369757”]Hell yeah, finally some WWE Fans. I used to love watching WWE When I was younger, but I don’t anymore because it’s too fake, it’s like watching a soapopera because they’ve lost some many good wrestlers.

The one night that I watched WWE in a year was when WWE Old School came on, about a week or two ago. My favorite wrestlers of all time would be Mankind, Hulk Hogan, Old school Kane and Undertaker, Stone Cold, and the Rock. I’m more of a later WWF Fan, like about 1996-2001 would be my favorite wrestling era. Nice topic.[/quote]

I’m with you there, I loved it when it was WWF and they would have backstages brawls and shit and people being thrown through windows. That’s when it was awesome. I absolutely loved it up until 2003-2004. They had good storylines in 2006 though when DX reunited.

Read full topic

item.title: WWE Discussion
item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10
item.description:
@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

Hell yeah, finally some WWE Fans. I used to love watching WWE When I was younger, but I don’t anymore because it’s too fake, it’s like watching a soapopera because they’ve lost some many good wrestlers.

The one night that I watched WWE in a year was when WWE Old School came on, about a week or two ago. My favorite wrestlers of all time would be Mankind, Hulk Hogan, Old school Kane and Undertaker, Stone Cold, and the Rock. I’m more of a later WWF Fan, like about 1996-2001 would be my favorite wrestling era. Nice topic.

Read full topic
